definition: echo/sound/noise/to make a sound/to sound/to ring/loud/classifier for noises
country or countryside/native place/home village or town/township (PRC administrative unit)
sound/noise/note (of musical scale)/tone/news/syllable/reading (phonetic value of a character)
sound/acoustics/audio/hi-fi system/stereo sound system/abbr. for 組合音響|组合音响[zu3 he2 yin1 xiang3]
to start shooting or firing/to win an initial success/to succeed (of a plan)
to sound a bell/to raise the alarm

sentences.english: What time shall I set the alarm (clock) for?
sentences.chinese: 我該把鬧鐘撥到幾點鐘響？

sentences.english: In the middle of the bridge,his old car spluttered out.
sentences.chinese: 在過橋走到橋中間時，他的那輛破車劈啪響着熄了火。

sentences.english: Sometimes M. Mabeuf started at the sound of the bell.
sentences.chinese: 有時馬白夫先生聽到門鈴響而驚動起來。

sentences.english: The carrying pole creaked under the load.
But to bats, it's as loud as a jet airplane.
sentences.chinese: 但是對於蝙蝠來說，它們響的就像噴氣式飛機。

sentences.english: It is related to chunked Transfer-Encoding responses from the server.
sentences.chinese: 它是分塊傳輸編碼的響應從服務器。

sentences.english: The telephone had been ringing for three minutes before it was answered.
sentences.chinese: 電話鈴響了三分鐘纔有人接。

sentences.english: No one’s half as nerdy as I am. The bell rang in thirty seconds, precisely what her watch said.
sentences.chinese: 三十秒後下課鈴響了，跟她的表分秒不差。

sentences.english: The pot should only smile with heat.
Then I heard a faint beeping noise that didn't sound like a bird.
sentences.chinese: 這時，我聽見一陣微弱的響鬧聲，聽起來不像是鳥叫。

sentences.english: The military band played the national anthems of China and Spain with 21 salutes lingering in the sky.
sentences.chinese: 在雄壯的21響禮炮聲中，軍樂隊演奏中西兩國國歌。

sentences.english: For most newer vehicles, turn the cap until you hear it click three times.
sentences.chinese: 對於新汽車來說，擰緊蓋子，直至聽到響三下。

sentences.english: The leaves are rustling in the wind.
Then the fire alarm went off. I just grabbed my clothes and ran out.
sentences.chinese: 當時火險警報器響了，我一把抓起衣服就往外跑。

sentences.english: This time ear side apparently return at ring lightly that voice.
sentences.chinese: 此時的耳畔似乎還在輕輕的響着那聲音。

definition: to startle/to be frightened/to be scared/alarm
(of sth) to move/to set in movement/to displace/to touch/to make use of/to stir (emotions)/to alter/abbr. for 動詞|动词[dong4 ci2], verb
to pass on/to spread/to transmit/to infect/to transfer/to circulate/to conduct (electricity)
can/to be possible/to be able to/will/to be likely to/to be sure to/to assemble/to meet/to gather/to see/union/group/association/CL:個|个[ge4]/a moment (Taiwan pr. for this sense is [hui3])
to agree (to do sth)/should/ought to/must/(legal) shall
to answer/to respond/to comply with/to deal or cope with
between/among/within a definite time or space/room/section of a room or lateral space between two pairs of pillars/classifier for rooms
gap/to separate/to thin out (seedlings)/to sow discontent
to decide (to do something)/to resolve/decision/CL:個|个[ge4],項|项[xiang4]/certainly
